Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: The dark hallway ends abruptly here at a large door which is sealed.
Room.LongDescription: The dark hall heads back to the south into the darkness. On the north side of the hall is a large, silvery door with some arcane writing on it. It's pretty hard to read, but the symbols seem to say BEWARE. There doesn't seem to be a lock on the door.
